name: MultiSig
description: Multisignature wallet - Allows multiple parties to agree on transactions before execution.

eventDecorators.name: Confirmation
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: Deposit
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: Execution
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: InternalRequirementChange
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: OwnerAddition
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: OwnerRemoval
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: RequirementChange
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: Revocation
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

eventDecorators.name: Submission
eventDecorators.description: Triggered when the treasury address has been updated.

functionDecorators.name: addOwner
functionDecorators.description: Allows to add a new owner. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.

functionDecorators.name: changeInternalRequirement
functionDecorators.description: Allows to change the number of required confirmations. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: _internalRequired
parameterDecorators.description: Number of required confirmations for interal txs.

functionDecorators.name: changeRequirement
functionDecorators.description: Allows to change the number of required confirmations. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.

functionDecorators.name: confirmTransaction
functionDecorators.description: Allows an owner to confirm a transaction.

functionDecorators.name: executeTransaction
functionDecorators.description: Allows anyone to execute a confirmed transaction.

functionDecorators.name: getConfirmationCount
functionDecorators.description: Returns number of confirmations of a transaction.

functionDecorators.name: getConfirmations
functionDecorators.description: Returns array with owner addresses, which confirmed transaction.

functionDecorators.name: getTransactionCount
functionDecorators.description: Returns total number of transactions after filters are applied.

functionDecorators.name: getTransactionIds
functionDecorators.description: Returns list of transaction IDs in defined range.

parameterDecorators.name: from
parameterDecorators.description: Index start position of transaction array.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: Index end position of transaction array.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Contract constructor sets initial owners and required number of confirmations.

parameterDecorators.name: _required
parameterDecorators.description: Number of required confirmations for external transactions.

parameterDecorators.name: _internalRequired
parameterDecorators.description: Number of required confirmations for internal transactions.

functionDecorators.name: isConfirmed
functionDecorators.description: Returns the confirmation status of a transaction.

functionDecorators.name: removeOwner
functionDecorators.description: Allows to remove an owner. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.

functionDecorators.name: replaceOwner
functionDecorators.description: Allows to replace an owner with a new owner. Transaction has to be sent by wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: owner
parameterDecorators.description: Address of owner to be replaced.

functionDecorators.name: revokeConfirmation
functionDecorators.description: Allows an owner to revoke a confirmation for a transaction.

functionDecorators.name: submitTransaction
functionDecorators.description: Allows an owner to submit and confirm a transaction.
